cards.title: Email
cards.description: Email address of the Contact person

cards.title: Country
cards.description: Country of the Contact person

cards.title: ZIP
cards.description: ZIP of the Contact person

cards.title: City
cards.description: City of the Contact person

cards.title: First Name
cards.description: Textual string of letters denoting the first name of the Contact person

cards.title: Sex
cards.description: The sex of the study participants.

cards.title: ORCID
cards.description: The persistent digital identifier that distinguishes researchers. As defined by ORCID

cards.title: Last Name
cards.description: Textual string of letters denoting the last name of the Contact person

cards.title: Juristic person
cards.description: Textual string of letters denoting the juristic person e.g. a university, concern, country council etc.

cards.title: Department
cards.description: Department (e.g. division), or corresponding affiliation of the Contact person

cards.title: Address
cards.description: Street name and street number or PO Box of the Contact person

cards.title: Phone
cards.description: Phone to the contact including international call prefix

cards.title: Principal Investigator
cards.description: The name of the person responsible for the study e.g. the principal investigator

cards.title: Name
cards.description: The name of the study in English

cards.title: Total number of participants
cards.description: Total number of individuals recruited to the study

cards.title: Blood Type
cards.description: What is your type of blood

cards.title: ID
cards.description: The unique ID or acronym of the study

cards.title: Age unit
cards.description: Unit defining Age Low and Age High. Can be one of the following values: years, months, weeks, days

cards.title: Age High
cards.description: Age of the oldest study participant at the time of inclusion

cards.title: Material Type
cards.description: The biospecimen saved from a biological entity for propagation e.g. testing, diagnostics, treatment or research purposes.

cards.title: Total number of sample donors
cards.description: Total number of individuals with biological samples in the study.

cards.title: Data categories
cards.description: The type of data that is associated with the samples in the study

cards.title: Age Low
cards.description: Age of the youngest study participant at the time of inclusion

cards.title: Study design
cards.description: The design of the study

cards.title: Description
cards.description: A description of the study aim.
